snippet: Mr. Ellis was the soulful lead singer of the Trammps, whose 1970s hit “Disco Inferno” was immortalized in the film “Saturday Night Fever.”
abstract: Jimmy Ellis, soulful lead singer of 1970s group the Trammps, dies at age 74.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Ellis was the soulful lead singer of the Trammps, whose 1970s hit “Disco Inferno” was immortalized in the film “Saturday Night Fever.”

headline.seo: Jimmy Ellis, 74, Lead Singer in Dance Band Trammps
headline.main: Jimmy Ellis Dies at 74; Lead Singer in Dance Band Trammps
headline.print_headline: Jimmy Ellis, 74, Lead Singer In Dance Band Trammps
